description:
Reentrancy in MultiSigWallet.executeTransaction(uint256) (MultiSigWallet.sol#106-125):
	External calls:
	- (success) = transaction.to.call{value: transaction.value}(transaction.data) (MultiSigWallet.sol#121)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- ExecuteTransaction(msg.sender,_txIndex) (MultiSigWallet.sol#124)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [MultiSigWallet.executeTransaction(uint256)](contracts/MultiSigWallet.sol#L106-L125):
	External calls:
	- [(success) = transaction.to.call{value: transaction.value}(transaction.data)](contracts/MultiSigWallet.sol#L121)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [ExecuteTransaction(msg.sender,_txIndex)](contracts/MultiSigWallet.sol#L124)

description:

description: Pragma version^0.8.13 (MultiSigWallet.sol#2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.12/0.7.6/0.8.7
markdown: Pragma version[^0.8.13](contracts/MultiSigWallet.sol#L2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.12/0.7.6/0.8.7

description: solc-0.8.13 is not recommended for deployment
